products.name: Pro Performance Running Shoes
products.description: Advanced running shoes featuring responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Engineered for serious athletes seeking maximum performance.

products.name: Elite Training Mat
products.description: Premium exercise mat crafted with high-density foam. Perfect for yoga, stretching, and intense workout sessions with excellent grip and support.

products.name: Professional Resistance Band Set
products.description: Comprehensive resistance band set including multiple resistance levels. Ideal for strength training, rehabilitation, and versatile home workouts.

products.name: Advanced Fitness Tracker
products.description: State-of-the-art fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, and workout tracking. Water-resistant design for comprehensive activity monitoring.

products.name: Heavy Duty Dumbbell Set
products.description: Durable dumbbell set with a range of weights for strength training. Ideal for building muscle and enhancing your home gym setup.

products.name: Adjustable Kettlebell
products.description: Versatile adjustable kettlebell with multiple weight settings. Perfect for dynamic training routines and space-saving in home gyms.

products.name: Sports Hydration Backpack
products.description: Lightweight hydration backpack with a large water reservoir. Designed for athletes and adventurers to stay hydrated during intense workouts and outdoor activities.

products.name: High-Performance Jump Rope
products.description: Speed jump rope with adjustable length and ergonomic handles. Ideal for cardio workouts, improving endurance, and enhancing agility.

products.name: Durable Foam Roller
products.description: Premium foam roller designed for muscle recovery and flexibility. A must-have tool for athletes to relieve muscle tension and improve mobility.

products.name: Lightweight Hiking Backpack
products.description: Compact and durable hiking backpack with ample storage space and comfortable straps. Perfect for long hikes and outdoor adventures.

products.name: Breathable Running Shorts
products.description: Lightweight and moisture-wicking running shorts designed for ultimate comfort during long runs. Features breathable fabric and an adjustable waistband.

products.name: Sports Sunglasses
products.description: Polarized sports sunglasses designed for outdoor athletes. Provides UV protection and clear vision in various light conditions, perfect for cycling and running.
